name: Vita Browser

screenshots.caption: Next to my other running apps

short_description:
The Vita Browser is a non-commercial Chromium web browser project for surfing the web ad-free, all while talking to your friends at any time on any website! The Vita Browser was made free online, the next (non beta) release will consist of new features such as:
-Media Downloader
-Torrent Manager
-and more!
of course it may not have all the perks upon its first non-beta release! Currently Vita is only in it's Alpha stages!
summary: a non-commercial Chromium web browser project for surfing the web.
